hero.title: Take a break from
hero.subtitle: Let's face it, laundry sucks. At Dash & Dry, we make doing laundry fun and productive with our one-of-a-kind co-working laundry space! Save money, reclaim your time, and do what you love

solutions.title: Our Washing Solutions
solutions.subtitle: We offer a variety of laundry machines, including 3 12kg washers, 1 16kg washer,1 20kg washer, and 2 18kg dryers. Choose a load size that suits your needs and budget.

washer1.description: Great for 20 T-shirts, 4 pairs of jeans, and 4 bath towels

washer2.description: Great for 30 T-shirts, 6 pairs of jeans, and 6 bath towels

washer3.description: Great for 35 T-shirts, 8 pairs of jeans, and 8 bath towels

dryerDesc.description: For businesses with significant drying needs and consumption

features.two: Heat options: High, Medium, Low and no heat
